duties_responsibilities.duty: Designate shift and schedule assignments for nursing staff and technicians, ensuring adequate coverage for patient care needs.
Provide clinical leadership and supervision to nursing and technician staff, ensuring high-quality patient care delivery.
Support and implement nursing strategic initiatives, quality improvement, and patient and employee satisfaction programs.
Act as a liaison between physicians, staff, patients, and families to facilitate communication and problem-solving.
Ensure adherence to hospital policies and procedures, including patient care assignment and safety protocols.
Assist with emergency measures and ensure patient medical records contain necessary information.
Participate in orientation, preceptor training, and evaluation responsibilities for new personnel.
Enhance professional growth and development through educational programs, in-services, and workshops.
Follow patient safety-related policies, procedures, and protocols, and encourage patient participation in their own care.

education_certification.credential: Program Graduate in Nursing (Bachelor's Degree in Nursing preferred)
